S

sendNonRepliedRequest(Request) - Method in class com.vikwin.functcp.client.FunctionalTCPClient
Sends a request to the server without expecting a reply.
sendRepliedRequest(Request) - Method in class com.vikwin.functcp.client.FunctionalTCPClient
Sends a request to the server and waits for a reply.
setWorkerCount(int) - Method in class com.vikwin.functcp.server.FunctionalTCPServer
Sets the maximum count of threads the server will be using.
shutdown() - Method in class com.vikwin.functcp.server.FunctionalTCPServer
Shuts the server down if it is running.
start() - Method in class com.vikwin.functcp.server.FunctionalTCPServer
Starts the server in it's own thread.
